52 #define USBFIFO_DEVICE(device_name, cfg_ptr, state_ptr, mode_value, uid_value, gid_value) { \
53  .name = device_name, \
54  DEVICE_MODE(mode_value, uid_value, gid_value, S_IFCHR), \
55  DEVICE_DRIVER(usbfifo), \
56  .cfg.state = state_ptr, \
57  .cfg.dcfg = cfg_ptr \
58 }

61 #define USBFIFO_DEVICE_CFG(target_port, target_endpoint, target_endpoint_size, target_buffer, buffer_size) { \
62  .port = target_port, \
63  .endpoint = target_endpoint, \
64  .endpoint_size = target_endpoint_size, \
65  .buffer = target_buffer, \
66  .size = buffer_size, \
67 }
